education_text.0: Cerf received a Bachelor of Science degree in mathematics from      Stanford University Stanford UniversityHe left IBM to attend graduate school at the      University of California, Los Angeles University of California, Los Angeles, where he earned his MHe left IBM to attend graduate school at the      University of California, Los Angeles University of California, Los Angeles, where he earned his MCerf worked at the United States      Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA) from 1973 to 1982 and funded various groups to develop      redirect    TCPDuring 1997, Cerf joined the Board of Trustees of      Gallaudet University Gallaudet University, a university for the education of the deaf and hearingCerf has received a number of honorary degrees, including doctorates, from the      University of the Balearic Islands University of the Balearic Islands,      redirect    ETHZ in Zurich, Switzerland,      redirect    Capitol College Capitol College,      Gettysburg College Gettysburg College,      Yale University Yale University,
